name: Crystal I
core: A clarifying current gathers around the essential question.
shadow: Clarity hardens into rigidity when certainty is prized over truth.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward decisive but measured action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests slowing down before naming the answer.

name: Crystal II
core: The pattern asks for preservation before expansion.
shadow: Conservation turns stagnant when fear prevents a necessary step.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates motion should be tested before commitment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports restraint and careful consolidation.

name: Crystal III
core: Several obligations can be aligned without sacrificing the center.
shadow: Balance is lost when accommodation replaces judgment.
astralNote: Its astral note suggests coordinated action among competing duties.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing noise before choosing a side.

name: Crystal IV
core: Momentum grows when the truth is stated without ornament.
shadow: Momentum becomes pressure when speech outruns preparation.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward clear commitment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reviewing the cost of haste.

name: Crystal V
core: A balancing presence steadies the reading and softens extremes.
shadow: Balance can become indecision when no claim is allowed to sharpen.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates action should remain proportionate.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports deliberate re-centering.

name: Crystal VI
core: The reading suggests patience while hidden structure becomes visible.
shadow: Waiting becomes avoidance when necessary labor is deferred.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a limited advance with clear safeguards.
umbralNote: Its umbral note indicates the slower path is currently wiser.

name: Crystal VII
core: The larger pattern favors conviction supported by preparation.
shadow: Conviction becomes strain when the burden is carried alone.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a timely commitment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests securing support before moving.

name: Crystal VIII
core: A hidden reserve protects the work from premature exposure.
shadow: Protection becomes isolation when nothing is allowed to reach you.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a careful unveiling may be timely.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports shielding what is not ready.

name: Crystal IX
core: Study and solitude suggest that the answer matures through sustained attention.
shadow: Reflection becomes estrangement when distance is mistaken for wisdom.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward acting from hard-earned understanding.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests remaining with the question a little longer.

name: Crystal X
core: A turning of conditions suggests that timing is part of the answer.
shadow: Cycles become excuses when responsibility is handed over to fate.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates readiness to move with the opening.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests waiting for the full turn to reveal itself.

name: Crystal XI
core: Measured force suggests that disciplined strength can resolve the present pressure.
shadow: Strength curdles into domination when restraint is treated as weakness.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward decisive effort governed by discipline.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests containing force until it can be applied cleanly.

name: Crystal XII
core: A reversal of perspective suggests that progress now comes through surrendering the old angle.
shadow: Yielding becomes passivity when sacrifice is made without discernment.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates that a new vantage can unlock timely action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports suspension, reassessment, and patient reorientation.

name: Crystal XIII
core: An ending clarifies the field and suggests that something complete should be allowed to conclude.
shadow: Necessary endings become ruin when loss is resisted past reason.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward clearing space for the next true beginning.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports closure, release, and honest acknowledgment.

name: Crystal XIV
core: Temperance suggests that durable progress comes through measured blending rather than excess.
shadow: Moderation becomes dilution when every edge is softened beyond use.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates coordinated movement and proportionate effort.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports rebalancing and careful integration.

name: Crystal XV
core: Attachment to appetite or control suggests that the reading is testing what holds power over you.
shadow: Entanglement deepens when appetite is renamed as necessity.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward naming the bond clearly and refusing its exaggerations.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests stepping back from compulsive movement.

name: Crystal XVI
core: A fracture in structure suggests that unstable arrangements are already giving way.
shadow: Collapse worsens when the warning is denied and the failing structure is defended.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates that rebuilding can begin once the break is acknowledged.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports caution while instability continues to reveal itself.

name: Crystal XVII
core: Hope grounded in clear sight suggests that renewal is available without fantasy.
shadow: Hope becomes projection when longing overwrites what is actually present.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward moving with confidence tempered by observation.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving the hope while letting the pace remain slow.

name: Crystal XVIII
core: Ambiguity suggests the unseen is active and should be handled with caution rather than panic.
shadow: Ambiguity becomes self-deception when fear is allowed to write the story.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates that one careful step can test what is real.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports stillness, observation, and keeping conclusions provisional.

name: Crystal XIX
core: Clear vitality suggests the reading favors openness, confidence, and straightforward expression.
shadow: Brightness becomes exposure when everything is revealed before it is ready.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward acting plainly and without theatricality.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests protecting the center even while remaining visible.

name: Crystal XX
core: A call to reckoning suggests that the matter should now be judged in full rather than in fragments.
shadow: Judgment distorts when the verdict is chosen before the evidence is faced.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates readiness to answer the call directly.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports review, confession, and careful accounting.

name: Crystal XXI
core: Completion suggests that the pattern can be understood as a whole rather than as isolated parts.
shadow: Completion becomes stagnation when closure is used to refuse the next cycle.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward stepping into the wider consequence of the work.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests confirming the ending before announcing it complete.

name: Crystal XXII
core: A new threshold suggests that beginnings matter most when they are entered with awareness rather than innocence.
shadow: Beginnings become drift when trust is separated from judgment.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a fresh step can be taken with deliberate openness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports preparing the ground before committing fully.
